## RuneTreeManager.findRuneById() method

Find a rune by its numerical ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findRuneById(id: number): Promise<Rune | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | number | The numerical ID of the rune to look for. |
